document_data.name: Chancereene Chaserperi
document_data.mainbody: [[Chancereene Chaserperi]] was the wife of [[Faereldan Chaserperi]], and the matriarch of the [[Chaserperi]] clan of [[mage]]s, in the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: She lived with her husband in a small manor on [[Skellin Street]], [[Athkatla]]. Their home had a walled garden on the back.
document_data.Activities: As of the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, she had taken over her husband's responsibilities as clan patriarch and was looking for a successor amongst the clan's younger generation.
document_data.Relationships: She used to spar verbally with her husband; as his memory began to fail, she became increasingly supportive, writing down names and sketching faces on his hand before meetings.
